Package edu.ntnu.idi.bidata.menu.cookbook

Class CookBookMenu

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idi.bidata.menu.cookbook.CookBookMenu
public class CookBookMenu extends Object
This class represents the cook book menu in the application. In the cook book menu the user should be able to manage the recipes.
Since:
22.11.2024
Version:
1.0.0

  • Constructor Details

    • CookBookMenu

      public CookBookMenu(UserInputHandler inputHandler, CookBook cookBook, FoodStorage foodStorage, StringMenu stringMenu, CookBookMenuMutator cookBookMenuMutator, CookBookMenuPrinter cookBookMenuPrinter)
      Constructs a new instance of CookBookMenu.
      Parameters:
      inputHandler - The handler for user input, used to read commands and data from user.
      cookBook - The cookbook that contains the collection of recipes to be managed.
      foodStorage - The storage that contains the groceries used in the recipes.
      stringMenu - The menu containing the string menus.
      cookBookMenuMutator - The class that handles the operations in cookbook menu.
      cookBookMenuPrinter - The class that handles printing related to cookbook menu.
      Since:
      0.0.1
